introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
My name is Youllou, I'm a computer engineering student passionate about software development, cybersecurity, and emerging technologies.
Curious by nature, I enjoy exploring a wide range of fields — from mobile and web development to embedded systems and IoT. Whether it's designing intuitive interfaces, automating complex processes, or building complete systems, I approach each project as an opportunity to learn and innovate.

Through this portfolio, I share the projects that drive me, the competitions that challenge me (especially in cybersecurity), as well as my contributions to both student and personal initiatives.
I always strive to combine technical rigor with creativity, paying close attention to user experience and solution robustness.

Enjoy your visit — and feel free to reach out if you'd like to collaborate or simply connect!

items.title: Member of the executive committee of DCI ETS
items.description: I am currently a member of the executive committee of DCI ETS, first as treasurer then Chief and this year as VP of Partnership. Through this organization, I thrive to promote cybersecurity and digital skills among students. We organize and participate to events, workshops, and competitions.

items.title: Internship at CFIA
items.description: Worked on Fertiscan, a web app used to analyze fertilizer labels leveraging AI.

items.title: Bachelor of Software Engineering
items.description: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering at ETS, where I am deepening my knowledge in software development, systems design, and cybersecurity.

items.title: Internship at L'Observatoire de la Nuit
items.description: Worked on SCAN, an interactive webapp used to visualize an array of street lights and lighting strategies on a map.

items.title: DUT in Computer Science
items.description: I completed my DUT in Computer Science at the University of Nantes, where I gained a solid foundation in software development and systems design.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on, showcasing my skills in software development, cybersecurity, and more. Each project reflects my passion for technology and my commitment to creating impactful solutions.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Feel free to reach out to me via email or connect with me on LinkedIn. I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
